Text: Thanks so much for posting this, waited a long time to see it.

Factually incorrect throughout the film and largely just a re-hash of existing Western video material from the DPRK. 
"Kimjongilia" is just as much propaganda as anything that the DPRK itself produces. The only difference is that this film is supporting the US world agenda and trying to portray the DPRK as a thoroughly evil country. Don't waste your time on this fake documentary.
Frejalight, fuck off you chinese bitch.
